text: Marek Koniarek (born 29 May 1962) is a retired Polish football striker. He was the Ekstraklasa top goalscorer in 1995-96.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland international footballers Category:Szombierki Bytom players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Rot-Weiss Essen players Category:Zagłębie Sosnowiec players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Wiener Sport-Club players Category:SKN St. Pölten players Category:SK Vorwärts Steyr players Category:Wisła Kraków players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:2. title: Marek Koniarek
